languages.text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан, но с вопросами подобного рода вам лучше обратиться к Высокому фактотуму Янрису. Я больше разбираюсь в системах вокс-связи, нежели редких дарах".

traits.locale_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан, но с вопросами подобного рода вам лучше обратиться к Высокому Фактотуму Янрису. Я больше разбираюсь в системах вокс-связи, нежели редких дарах".

languages.text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."
languages.original_text: "Простите, Лорд-капитан, но с вопросами подобного рода вам лучше обратиться к Высокому фактотуму Янрису. Я больше разбираюсь в системах вокс-связи, нежели редких дарах".

traits.locale_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie more in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."
"I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie more in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."
"I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Janris. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

"I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."
"I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

languages.text: « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais ces questions relèvent de la compétence du haut factotum Danrok. Mon expertise concerne davantage les communications-vox que les cadeaux, disons... étranges. »
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: « Mes excuses, {mf|seigneur-capitaine|seigneure-capitaine}, mais ces questions relèvent de la compétence du haut factotum Janris. Mon expertise concerne davantage les communications-vox que les cadeaux, disons... étranges. »

languages.text: “向您致歉，舰长大人，但这样的事情属于高阶顾问丹罗克的工作范围。比起分析稀有礼物的含义，我更擅长音阵通讯。”
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: “向您致歉，舰长大人，但这样的事情属于高阶顾问詹里斯的工作范围。比起分析稀有礼物的含义，我更擅长音阵通讯。”

languages.text: "Ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain, doch solche Angelegenheiten fallen in den Zuständigkeitsbereich von Hoch-Faktotum Danrok. Ich verstehe mich eher auf Vox-Kommunikation denn auf seltene Geschenke."
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: "Ich bitte vielmals um Entschuldigung, Lord Captain, doch solche Angelegenheiten fallen in den Zuständigkeitsbereich von Hoch-Faktotum Janris. Ich verstehe mich eher auf Vox-Kommunikation denn auf seltene Geschenke."

languages.text: «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán, pero tales asuntos son competencia del Sumo Factótum Janris. Yo sé más de comunicaciones por voco que de regalos singulares».
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: «Mis disculpas, Lord Capitán, pero tales asuntos son competencia del Sumo Factótum Janris. Yo sé más de comunicaciones por voco que regalos extraños».

languages.text: 「お詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。しかし、そのような問題はハイ・ファクトタムであるダンロックの管轄下にあります。私は珍しい贈り物よりもヴォクス通信に精通しています」
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: 「お詫び申し上げます、ロード・キャプテン。しかし、そのような問題はハイ・ファクトタムであるダンロックの管轄下にあります。私は珍しい贈り物よりもヴォクス通信に精通しています」

languages.text: "Özürlerimi sunuyorum Lord Kaptan ama bu tür konular, Arşıkâhya Danrok'un alanıdır. Ben nadir armağanlardan çok voks iletişimlerinde uzman sayılırım."
languages.original_text: "I offer my apologies, Lord Captain, but such matters lie in the purview of High Factotum Danrok. I am better versed in vox-communications than rare gifts."

traits.locale_text: "Özürlerimi sunuyorum Lord Kaptan ama bu tip konular Arşıkâhya Danrok'un alanıdır. Ben nadir armağanlardan çok, voks iletişimleri konusunda uzman sayılırım."
